text: Hey team. How can you orderBy a foreign key property. Say you have books, and book categories, and book categories have a sort order which are going to be displayed using a groupby…. ‘orderBy=category.order’ doesn’t seem to work…. ideas?

Hi all, is it possible to have one listing page for 2 tables from hubDB? for an example, i have a page products but i have 2 tables `featured products` and `products`   (i use 2 tables because i need to have different dynamic page for the featured and normal product). can i have just one single listing page for this 2 tables???
Hey Stefen - how about adding an extra column to “products” with the layout type?
and then with if statement change layout based on that column? sound about right! ill try that
